NationMania.db

Class DBConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • NationMania.db.DBConnectionPool

  • public final class DBConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Containing implementation of Connection Pool for getting connections to communicate with DB affectively.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int busy 
      private java.util.Vector<java.sql.Connection> freeConnections
      Vector at the size of MAX_CONNECTIONS that represents the number of free connections to use
      static int MAX_CONNECTIONS
      Configuration Constant - sets the maximum number of parallel connections to the DB
      private int maxConnections 
      private java.lang.String password 
      private java.lang.String URL 
      private java.lang.String user

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_CONNECTIONS

        public static int MAX_CONNECTIONS
        Configuration Constant - sets the maximum number of parallel connections to the DB

      • freeConnections

        private java.util.Vector<java.sql.Connection> freeConnections
        Vector at the size of MAX_CONNECTIONS that represents the number of free connections to use

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBConnectionPool

        public DBConnectionPool(java.lang.String URL,
                        java.lang.String user,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        int maxConnections)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        URL - SQL server URL
        user - SQL server user name
        password - SQL server password
        maxConnections - amount of connections

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Called by every query and in any new attemp to connect with the DB. If there is available free connection that is already open in the freeConnections vector - it uses it. Else, try to open a new connection to the DB
        Returns:
        the connection if connecting succeeded, and null otherwise

      • newConnection

        private java.sql.Connection newConnection()

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection(long timeout)

      • freeConnection

        public void freeConnection(java.sql.Connection con)
        Called at the end of every query. Free the connection by sending it back to the pool, making it available for use
        Parameters:
        con - connection to be freed

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Called when user hit the "quit" button in the Main Menu screen. Close all open connections to the DB
